channel.title: creatures on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in creatures on Chaotic Online

item.title: Malvadine
item.description: Malvadine is an Elite Warrior of the Mipedian Tribe.

item.title: Maxxor
item.description: Maxxor is an OverWorld Hero and the ruler of the OverWorld Tribe

item.title: Takinom
item.description: Takinom is an UnderWorld Commander who serves Chaor as one of his Counsellors, along with Agitos.

item.title: Wamma
item.description: Wamma is a Danian Mandiblor and the most iconic Creature of his Tribe

item.title: Najarin
item.description: Najarin is an OverWorld Muge who serves Maxxor along with Intress as one of his Counsellors.

item.title: Nauthilax
item.description: Nauthilax is an UnderWorld Elementalist and a maritime spy to his Tribe

item.title: Zhade
item.description: Zhade is a Mipedian Stalker and an infiltrator agent of his Tribe

item.title: Blazier
item.description: Blazier is an OverWorld Scout and the cartographer of his Tribe.

item.title: H'earring
item.description: H’earring is an UnderWorld Scout and great small a spy for his Tribe.

item.title: Prince Mudeenu
item.description: Prince Mudeenu is a Mipedian Royal and the next in line of succession of his Tribe

item.title: Chaor
item.description: Chaor is an UnderWorld Conqueror and the Warrior ruler of the UnderWorld Tribe

item.title: Heptadd
item.description: Heptadd is a powerful Guardian and a Muge of the OverWorld

item.title: Tartarek
item.description: Tartarek is an OverWorld Hero and the head of the spy network head of his Tribe

item.title: Ulmar
item.description: Ulmar is an UnderWorld Conqueror and the mad scientist of his Tribe

item.title: Bodal
item.description: Bodal is an OverWorld Caretaker and the head Logistics Manager of his Tribe

item.title: Magmon
item.description: Magmon is an UnderWorld Elementalist descendant of the ruler of his Tribe back in the times of Ancient Perim

item.title: Dractyl
item.description: Dractyl is a terrifying flying Overworld Scout and a swift spy of his Tribe

item.title: Tangath Toborn
item.description: Tangath Toborn is a brave Warrior and wise a Strategist of the OverWorld

item.title: Najarin, High Muge of the Lake
Prince Mudeenu, Champion of the Guard
